common.appName: PickPic: One-click downloader for images and videos from any webpage

settings.title: Extension Settings
settings.aboutDescription: One-click downloader for images and videos from any webpage, with enhanced support for WeChat Official Account articles.
settings.privacyIntro: PickPic respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.
settings.dataCollectionText: This extension does NOT collect, store, or transmit any personal data. All operations are performed locally on your device.
settings.permissionsText: The extension requires the following permissions:
settings.permissionSidePanel: To display the side panel UI
settings.permissionAllUrls: To extract content from any website
settings.thirdPartyText: This extension does not use any third-party analytics or tracking services.
settings.feedbackIntro: We value your feedback! If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please let us know.
settings.githubText: Report bugs or request features on our GitHub repository.
settings.emailText: You can also reach us via email.
settings.feedbackAppreciate: We appreciate your feedback and will do our best to respond as quickly as possible.
settings.sendEmail: Send us your feedback or questions via email.
settings.donateIntro: If you find this extension helpful, consider supporting its development.
settings.donateText: Your support helps us maintain and improve this extension. Thank you!
settings.donateMessage: If you find this extension helpful, consider supporting its development. Your support helps keep this project free and open-source!
settings.starGithubText: Give us a star on GitHub to show your support and help others discover this project.
settings.reportIssuesText: Help improve the extension by reporting bugs or suggesting new features.
settings.shareText: Share this extension with your friends and colleagues who might find it useful.
